name: Global Conflict - Large-Scale War Economic Impact
description: Simulation of a 5-year global conflict with comprehensive economic impacts including military spending escalation, trade disruption, human capital loss, infrastructure destruction, inflation surge, and social stability deterioration

metadata.notes: Models a large-scale global conflict with 5% GDP military spending increase, 40% trade disruption, 10% inflation surge, 5% annual workforce loss, and 10% annual infrastructure destruction over 5 years. Includes post-conflict recovery dynamics.
